quote: Life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change. – Jim Rohn
fact: There are only four words in the English language which end in "dous": tremendous, horrendous, stupendous, and  hazardous.
joke: Frankenstein enters a bodybuilding competition and finds he has seriously misunderstood the objective.
